author: Alex O'Connor
description:
Come to my tour in February:
https://www.livenation.co.uk/alex-o-connor-tickets-adp1641612

For early, ad-free access to videos, and to support the channel, subscribe to my Substack: https://www.alexoconnor.com.

To donate to my PayPal (thank you): http://www.paypal.me/cosmicskeptic.

 - VIDEO NOTES

Alain de Botton is the creator of @theschooloflifetv. A Swiss-born British author and public speaker, his books discuss various contemporary subjects and themes, emphasizing philosophy's relevance to everyday life.

 - LINKS

Sheehan Quirke, "How Did The World Get So Ugly?": https://youtu.be/tWYxrowovts?si=vW3fmkUACeVpp-5C

 - TIMESTAMPS

0:00 - Tour
0:31 - Is the World Getting Uglier?
15:03 - Is Beauty Right Wing?
29:04 - Beauty Needs Context
31:48 - How Music Ruins Everything
33:58 - Our Taste Reflects What We're Missing in Life
45:05 - Is There Such a Thing as "Fake Art"?

 - CONNECT

title: Why is Everything Ugly Now? - Alain de Botton
